General_review: Burger King is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Burgers, Fast Food, Fried Chicken that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Chicken Royale Meal, Chicken Fries, Chicken Tenders and 4Pcs Kids Chicken Tenders Meal , although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Burgers, Fast Food, Fried Chicken.
They have been reviewed 450654 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

General_review: Rochas sweets is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Desserts, Pastries, Cakes that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Dolce Sweet, Snak, Fabio Sweet and The Cube, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Pastries, Cakes.
They have been reviewed 14290 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Al Haba Items.name: Angel Hair Chocolate Bar
Al Haba Items.description: Vanilla and strawberry bar is filled with cotton candy and features a unique pistachio and kuna fa filling. It is coated at the back with premium Swiss chocolate and infused with a refreshing zesty flavor on the inside. This bar is a perfect blend of classic flavors with modern twists, delivering an unforgettable experience with every bite.

Al Haba Items.name: Milk Crunchy
Al Haba Items.description: Milk crunchy is a blend of dark chocolate sponge with rich french milk chocolate and a crispy crÃªpe crunch. Topped with premium chocolate sauce, it offers you an unparalleled experience of delicious, crunchy chocolate in every bite.

Al Haba Items.name: Cake 360
Al Haba Items.description: Tropical coconut sponge is unique delicious blend of honey coconut cream, coconut honey with touch of nestle sauce and cream. This combination offers you rich and distinctive tropical coconut flavor in every bite.

Al Haba Items.name: Tiramisu The Qatari Craze
Al Haba Items.description:
The taste? Pure fantasy
Crafted with a secret recipe that takes you on a flavor journey from the very first bite. A dessert that brings the rich spirit of Qatar to life â€” elegant, bold, and unforgettable. Not your ordinary tiramisu this is Qatarâ€™s favorite indulgence

Al Haba Items.description: A perfect blend of soft chocolate sponge, creamy NestlÃ© mix, chocolate rice crispies, and premium French chocolate.

Al Haba Items.description: A luxurious dessert featuring rich layers of soft red velvet cake, topped with smooth blueberry, strawberry jelly, harmonized with creamy Nestle sauce, finished with a thin layer of grated coconut cream, providing an exceptional taste and unique texture.

Al Haba Summer.name: Ice Fru Strawberry
Al Haba Summer.description: Strawberry gelato is a unique blend of 7 pieces of delicious strawberry-flavored gelato, combining the creamy richness of strawberry with a smooth texture. It offers a perfect and refreshing experience for all summer fruit lovers.

Al Haba Summer.name: Ice Fru Peach
Al Haba Summer.description: Peach gelato is a unique blend of 7 pieces of delicious peach-flavored gelato, combining the creamy richness of peach with a smooth texture. It offers a perfect and refreshing experience for all summer fruit lovers.

Al Haba Summer.name: Ice Fru Mango

Al Haba Summer.name: Strawberry Gelato
Al Haba Summer.description: Strawberry gelato is a unique mix of 26 pieces of strawberry flavored gelato with a layer of strawberry gelato and sponge cake. It combines the creamy taste of fresh strawberries with the soft texture of cake, providing the ideal experience for strawberry lovers.

Al Haba Summer.name: Peach Gelato
Al Haba Summer.description: Peach gelato is a delicious blend of 26 pieces of peach-flavored gelato with a layer of peach gelato, sponge cake offering you a fresh and sweet taste in every bite. Perfect for peach lovers and fans of refreshing summer fruits.

Al Haba Summer.name: Berry Gelato
Al Haba Summer.description: Berry gelato is a delicious blend of 26 pieces of berry flavored gelato with a layer of berry gelato and sponge cake it offers you a fresh, sweet taste in every bite, perfect for berry lovers and fruit enthusiasts

Al Haba Summer.name: Lemon Ice Beads
Al Haba Summer.description: Lemon ice-beads are a refreshing and tangy experience that combines the natural flavor of lemon with crunchy ice beads, offering you a zesty and refreshing taste in every bite.

Al Haba Summer.description: Mango ice beads are a delicious and refreshing experience that combines the natural flavor of mango with crunchy ice beads, offering you a sweet and tropical taste in every bite.

Al Haba Summer.description: Coconut ice cream is a creamy and delicious blend made with fresh coconut, offering you a rich and refreshing taste with a tropical touch that adds a special delight in every bite

Al Haba Summer.name: Avocado Ice Cream
Al Haba Summer.description: Avocado ice cream is a unique experience that combines the rich creaminess of avocado with a delicious sweet taste. It's prepared using fresh, ripe avocados, giving you a refreshing and rich flavor that will delight you with every bite.

Al Haba Summer.name: Pineapple Ice Cream Drink
Al Haba Summer.description: Pineapple ice cream drink is a refreshing and delicious combination that combines the rich, creamy flavor of ice cream with fresh pineapple pieces, giving you the perfect experience to enjoy the most delicious summer flavors

General_review: Lulu Sweets is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Desserts, Arabic sweets, Cakes that delivers across Jahra - Jahra Area, Mahboula and Reggai.

Their best selling dishes are Luqaimat With Cheese, Mini Box Of Grape Leaves, Luqaimat And Mix Samosa and Mini Ulker Box, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Arabic sweets, Cakes.
They have been reviewed 12417 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Overjar is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Desserts, Cakes that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Pecan Cake, Cinnamon Churros , Profiteroles Pyramid and Mini S'mores Cookies, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Cakes.
They have been reviewed 52278 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Toby's Estate is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Coffee, Desserts, Juices that delivers across Abu Halifa, Al-Qurain, Jabriya, Jahra - Taima and Khairan.
Their best selling dishes are Iced Toby's Latte, 12 Oz Toby's Latte, 6 Oz Flat White and Iced Americano, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Coffee, Desserts, Juices.
They have been reviewed 21478 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: 89 Sweets is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Desserts, Chocolate , Arabic sweets that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Offer NewMix & Mawaleh, Offer Chocolate 2022 & Mawaleh, Offer Chocolate 2022 & Babka and Gift box black Large, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Chocolate , Arabic sweets.
They have been reviewed 9105 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Melenzane is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Italian, Desserts, Pasta that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Milly, Bolognaise, Herbed Fries and Mushroom Ravioli, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Italian, Desserts, Pasta.
They have been reviewed 22459 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Asha's is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Indian, Asian, Biryani that delivers across Al Waab, Bneid Al Qar, Jabriya, Mahboula and Oud Metha.

Their best selling dishes are Murg Biryani Awadhi, Murg Makhani (Butter Chicken), Asha For 1 and Aloo Matar Ki Tikki, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Indian, Asian, Biryani.
They have been reviewed 3459 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

They have been reviewed 3206 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Chacka Chacka is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Burgers, Chicken, Sandwiches that delivers across Ardiya Small Industrial, Hawally, Jahra - Jahra Area, Khaitan and Mahboula.

Their best selling dishes are Chicken Fillet Sandwich, Double Chicken, Onion Rings and Chacka Chacka Sauce, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Burgers, Chicken, Sandwiches.
They have been reviewed 6815 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

Gathering.name: Chicken Caesar Gathering Salad
Gathering.description: Romaine, grilled chicken, croutons, freshly shaved parmesan with caesar dressing. Serves 4 - 6 people.

Gathering.name: Pomegranate Fattoush Gathering Salad
Gathering.description: Romaine, arugula, parsley and mint, tomatoes, cucumbers, roasted red peppers, pomegranate, sumac, crunchy pita bread with balsamic vinaigrette dressing. Serves 4 - 6 people.

Gathering.name: Quinoa Beet Gathering Salad
Gathering.description: Iceberg, quinoa, beetroot, kalamata olives, sunflower seeds, roasted red pepper with balsamic vinaigrette. Serves 4 - 6 people.

Gathering.name: Thai Crunch Gathering Salad
Gathering.description: Iceberg, teriyaki chicken, cucumbers, noodles, carrots, pickled onions, edamame, swirl of spicy asian peanut dressing with carb-free asian sesame ginger dressing. Serves 4 - 6 people.

Gathering.name: Classic Caesar Gathering Salad
Gathering.description: Romaine, croutons, freshly shaved parmesan with caesar dressing. Serves 4 - 6 people.

Gathering.name: Pesto Pasta Gathering Salad
Gathering.description: Arugula, pesto pasta, kalamata olives, corn, tomato, feta cheese, sliced almonds with mustard vinaigrette. Serves 4 - 6 people.

Gathering.name: Chickpea Fatteh Gathering Salad
Gathering.description: Romaine, chickpeas, pomegranate, roasted eggplant, fried onions, crunchy pita bread, sumac, parsley, mint with tahini dressing. Serves 4 - 6 people.

General_review: Arnies Sliders is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Burgers, American, Sliders that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Angry Fries, Original Chicken Slider, Double Slider Meal and Pink Rocca Slider, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Burgers, American, Sliders.
They have been reviewed 38700 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Steak & Fahita Stations is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Sandwiches, Burgers, Shawarma that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Chicken Fillet Meal, Chicken Fillet, Fajita Station and Philadelphia, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Sandwiches, Burgers, Shawarma.
They have been reviewed 5759 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

info.Address: in West Abu Fetera Small Indust, Kuwait

General_review: Lahm is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Shawarma, Sandwiches, Arabic that delivers across Ardhiya and West Abu Fetera Small Indust.

Their best selling dishes are French Fries, Meat Shawerma 30 G, Chicken Shawarma 30 G and Meat Shawerma 50 G, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Shawarma, Sandwiches, Arabic.
They have been reviewed 5733 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Customer_reviews.review_comment: the taste was better last year, still not bad. it took 20 minutes dor him to understand which building it is.

General_review: Maki is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Sushi, Japanese, Seafood that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Issa Mame Maki 6 Pieces, Spicy Crab Avocado Salad, Special Prawns Tempura and Crispy Salad, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Sushi, Japanese, Seafood.
They have been reviewed 11437 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.
